contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced stub|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} {{NLL Defunct Team Infobox |team_name=Anaheim Storm |bg_color=blue |title_color=white |logo=AnaheimStorm.png |logo_size=225px |played=2004â€“2005 |home_arena=[[Honda Center|Arrowhead Pond]] |hometown=[[Anaheim, California]] |team_colors=blue, white |division=Western |division_champs= |champs= |formerly=[[New Jersey Storm]] }} The '''Anaheim Storm '''was a member of the [[National Lacrosse League]]. They played at the [[Honda Center|Arrowhead Pond]], now the Honda Center, in [[Anaheim, California|Anaheim]], [[California]]. They were the [[New Jersey Storm]] from the [[2002 NLL season|2002]] season to [[2003 NLL season|2003]]. Starting for the [[2004 NLL season|2004]] season the team relocated to [[Anaheim, California]]. After the [[2005 NLL season|2005 season]], the Storm suspended operations due to low attendance. The franchise was owned by [[NBA]] star [[Jayson Williams]]. ==All time Record== {| class="wikitable" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="3" CELLSPACING="0" |- ALIGN=center bgcolor="#e0e0e0" ! Season !! Division !! W-L !! Finish !! Home !! Road !! GF !! GA !! Coach !!
